PR Title: feat: add customizable ASCII art header support to TUI
PR Description: ## Summary

Adds support for customizable ASCII art headers in the TUI executor. Previously, the TUI displayed a hardcoded "FORGE" ASCII art header. Now, applications can specify custom header text that will be automatically converted to ASCII art using a block-style font.

## Changes

- Added new `pkg/ui/ascii.go` with `GenerateASCIIArt()` function supporting A-Z, 0-9, and common symbols
- Added comprehensive test coverage in `pkg/ui/ascii_test.go` (111 lines)
- Updated `tui.NewExecutor()` to accept optional `headerText` parameter
- Modified `model.go` to store custom header text
- Updated `view.go` to dynamically generate ASCII art from header text instead of using hardcoded art
- Updated `cmd/forge/main.go` to pass "forge" as header text
- Updated `examples/agent-chat/main.go` to pass "FORGE" as header text

## Testing

- Run the forge TUI: `go run cmd/forge/main.go` - verify "FORGE" ASCII art displays correctly
- Run the agent-chat example: `go run examples/agent-chat/main.go` - verify "FORGE" ASCII art displays
- Run tests: `go test ./pkg/ui/...` - verify ASCII art generation for various characters
- Test with custom header text by modifying the `headerText` parameter in `NewExecutor()`
